gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of available authenticator providers for the specified realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of authenticator providers available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Client application requesting available client authenticator providers for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of client authenticator providers available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user submitting a new authentication configuration for the realm.
gold.ideal: Creates a new authentication configuration in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user seeking detailed configuration description for a specific provider.
gold.ideal: Returns the configuration description for the specified authenticator provider.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving a specific authentication configuration by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the authentication configuration details for the specified ID.

gold.user: Admin user updating an existing authentication configuration by ID.
gold.ideal: Updates the authentication configuration for the specified ID.

gold.user: Admin user deleting an authentication configuration by ID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the authentication configuration for the specified ID.

gold.user: Admin user adding a new execution to the authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new execution in the authentication flow for the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific execution by its ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified execution.

gold.user: Admin user removing a specific execution from the authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified execution from the authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user configuring settings for a specific execution.
gold.ideal: Creates or updates the configuration for the specified execution.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving configuration details for a specific execution.
gold.ideal: Returns the configuration details for the specified execution.

gold.user: Admin user lowering the priority of a specific execution.
gold.ideal: Lowers the priority of the specified execution in the authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user raising the priority of a specific execution.
gold.ideal: Raises the priority of the specified execution in the authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of authentication flows for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of authentication flows configured in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new authentication flow in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user copying an existing authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Copies the specified authentication flow to create a new one.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving executions for a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Returns the list of executions for the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user updating executions for a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Updates the executions in the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user adding a new execution to a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new execution in the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user adding a new flow to a specific authentication flow.
gold.ideal: Creates a new flow in the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific authentication flow by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user updating an existing authentication flow by ID.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific authentication flow by ID.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified authentication flow.

gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of form action providers for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of form action providers available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of form providers for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of form providers available in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user seeking configuration descriptions specific to client applications.
gold.ideal: Returns the per-client configuration description for the realm.

gold.user: Admin user registering a new required action for authentication.
gold.ideal: Registers a new required action in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of required actions for the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of required actions configured in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific required action by alias.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified required action.

gold.user: Admin user updating an existing required action by alias.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified required action.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific required action by alias.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified required action.

gold.user: Admin user lowering the priority of a specific required action.
gold.ideal: Lowers the priority of the specified required action.

gold.user: Admin user raising the priority of a specific required action.
gold.ideal: Raises the priority of the specified required action.

gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of unregistered required actions.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of unregistered required actions available for the realm.
